overview: The heroes of the film are a team of gamers who play a computer game. Their dream is to become a cool team, to get into international competitions. But for this they need money. By chance, in the hands of the guys, there is an encrypted message from Radzivil about a hidden treasure. And the adventure begins. And if at first the teenager's goal was money, then at the end of the story the guys understand that the main thing for them is friendship and mutual assistance, and the material component is not the most important thing in life.
title: Gamer's Rules
